topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1: Deploy the KVM Region Patch 6

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p:
You must install the following patches before installing this patch:
KVM Custom Patch 5 (HCG_2.0 WR006 Patch025)
section.note: You can use the Horizon UI to see if the patch has been deployed. Select the regionkvm, then click Admin, then System, and Inventory. Click the Patches table for the patches. Or use the CLI on the active KVM controller: sudo sw-patch query.

body.section:
Download the patch
If you have not downloaded the patch, launch the Helion Distribution Network (HDN). You must obtain a user account on HDN in order to download these files. In a browser, navigate to Helion Download Network(HDN).
Click Sign In to log in using your account.
After signing in, click the Downloads link in the menu on the left side of the page.
Download the file and the associated checksum and signature files.
Verify the downloaded signature and the downloaded checksums.
Extract the compressed files until the TS_HP_15_Custom_PATCH_0006.patch and readme files are available.
